hero.title: High-Tech Websites Development
hero.subtitle: Custom websites and web applications for businesses in Israel
hero.description: I build fast, scalable, and conversion-focused digital products. I help Israeli companies launch websites and web platforms that look premium and perform at a high level.

about.title: About Me
about.description: I am a professional web developer focused on building modern and optimized digital products. I work directly with businesses in Israel and deliver frontend, backend, API integrations, performance optimization, and SEO-ready architecture.

Business Websites.title: Business Websites
Business Websites.desc: Professional sites that build trust and convert visitors into clients.

E-commerce.desc: Online stores optimized for speed, UX, and sales growth.

Web Applications.title: Web Applications
Web Applications.desc: Custom web systems with clean architecture and scalable backend.

Landing Pages.title: Landing Pages
Landing Pages.desc: High-converting pages for campaigns, launches, and lead generation.

API Integrations.title: API Integrations
API Integrations.desc: Reliable integration with CRMs, payment gateways, and external platforms.

Speed Optimization.title: Speed Optimization
Speed Optimization.desc: Core Web Vitals improvements for better UX and rankings.

SEO for Israeli Market.title: SEO for Israeli Market
SEO for Israeli Market.desc: Localized structure and technical SEO tuned for Israeli search behavior.

1.title: Legal Company Website
1.full: I designed and developed a multilingual law firm website with strong SEO foundations and a conversion-oriented structure.

2.title: Fashion E-commerce
2.full: I implemented a modern e-commerce experience with high mobile performance, robust catalog management, and payment integrations.

3.title: Logistics Dashboard
3.full: I built a custom dashboard for a logistics team with live data sync, role-based access, and reporting modules.

4.title: Real Estate Landing
4.full: I created a landing page optimized for paid traffic, with A/B-ready sections and conversion tracking.

5.title: Medical Center Website
5.full: I delivered a clean and accessible clinic website featuring appointment workflows and local SEO structure.

6.title: Electronics E-commerce
6.full: I developed a scalable online store for electronics with advanced filtering, analytics, and optimized product pages.
